# nwmHistoric

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/mikejohnson51/nwmHistoric.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/mikejohnson51/nwmHistoric)
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github('mikejohnson51/nwmHistoric')
```

# Features

 * Access Historic NWM Reanalyis timeseries data by feature for versions 1.2 and 2.0
 * Data requests can be subset temporally, and adjsted for timezone
 * Functions for finding appropriate NHD and NWIS Identifiers
 * Family of aggregate functions to groups and summarise data
